LanguageData.MineableUranium.label: compacted oricalcum
LanguageData.MineableUranium.description: Ancient compacted rubble rich in oricalcum.
LanguageData.Uranium.label: oricalcum
LanguageData.Uranium.description: A dark, heavy metal. Walls built from this metal are renowned for being impenetrable, and its extreme density and hardness make it good for making certain weapons, armor, and ammunition.
